name: app/ErrorHandler.js

params.name: msg
params.description:
If string, then deal as Uncaught Error.
If error, then deal as http(ajax) error

params.name: urlOrReq
params.description:
If Uncaught Error, then error
script url. If http error, then http request

params.name: lineNoOrRes
params.description:
If Uncaught Error, then error
line number. If http error, then http response

params.name: columnNo
params.description:
error column number, may not provide
by some browsers

params.name: error
params.description: error object, may not provide by some browsers

name: app/State.js
get
description: get - get the entire app state

name: setListLoading
description: setListLoading - change the list loading status

params.name: listLoading
params.description: indicate ajax is loading or not

return.description: State instance itself, to enable chain

name: setList
description: setList - set the list to display

params.name: list
params.description: the list of news which will be display

return.description: State instance itself, to enable chain

name: setItem
description: setItem - set the selected news item to display

params.name: item
params.description: the selected news item which will be display

return.description: State instance itself, to enable chain

name: onChange
description: onChange - subscribe change event of state

params.name: listener
params.description: callback handler, will be called when state chagned

return.description: State instance itself, to enable chain

name: app/components/NewsDetail.js

params.name: props
params.description:
{ onClick(will be trigger when the back button
click), data(the news item data) }

name: onBackClick
description:
onBackClick - back button click handler, will call the props onClick func
and pass the event and news item data

name: renderTitle
description: renderTitle - render the news item title

name: renderBody
description: renderBody - render the news item body

name: render
description: render - render the detail of news item

name: app/components/NewsItem.js
NewsItem
description: News item node inside news list

params.name: props
params.description:
{ onClick(will be trigger when the item
click), data(the news item data) }

name: onClick
description:
onClick - item click handler, will call the props onClick func
and pass the event and news item data

name: renderTitle
description: renderTitle - render the news item title

name: renderBody
description: renderBody - render the news item body

name: app/components/NewsList.js

params.name: props
params.description:
{
onClick: will be trigger when the item click,
list: the news list data,
SpinImage:spin image url by webpack,
disablePre: should disable pre button or not,
disableNext: should disable next button or not,
loading: should should spin or list,
onNextClick: will be trigger when the next button click,
onPreClick: will be trigger when the pre button click,
query {
numberPerPage: number of news item display per page
search: search text for news item
orderBy: order key name [id, title, body]
orderDesc: order desc or asc
}
onQueryChange: will be trigger when the one of the query data change,
}

params.name: e
params.description: input event include the number value

params.name: e
params.description: input event include the search text

params.name: e
params.description: select event include the OrderBy key

name: renderOrderByDdl
description: renderOrderByDdl - reder order by select dom wrapper

return.description: the order by select dom wrapper

name: renderToolbar
description:
renderToolbar - render toolbar include pre, next, search, order, number
per page
